description:
After getting dumped by his girlfriend Keiko, Yusuke travels to the Demon Realm for a showdown with Yomi. Even after the break-up, Yusuke promises that he will return in three years time to take her hand in marriage.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eizou Hakusho II: The Yusuke Chapters
Eizou Hakusho II: Yuusuke no Shou
